text:
https://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.4/upgrading.html

Syntax error in a configuration example

<Location "/server-status">
    SetHandler server-status
    Require 127.0.0.1
</Location>


The key word "ip" is missing before the IP address.

Thanks a lot for reporting, this is a bug that I have introduced :)

Fixing it now..
